unnormalised: My nani was diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer last yr. Dr. Reddy at CMC Vellore suggested chemo and radiation therapy. It was tough, seeing her go thru it, but she's a fighter! Now she's in remission, thankfully. Get yourself checked regularly, ladies! Early detection is key. #cancerawareness #breastcancer #cmcvellore
normalised: My nani was diagnosed with stage three breast cancer last year. Doctor Reddy at C-M-C Vellore suggested chemo and radiation therapy. It was tough, seeing her go through it, but she's a fighter! Now she's in remission, thankfully. Get yourself checked regularly, ladies! Early detection is key. hash cancer awareness hash breast cancer hash C-M-C vellore
